mapper.select: select * from crm_user where User_id like '%${check}%' or User_loginname like '%${check}%' or User_loginpass like '%${check}%' or User_realname like '%${check}%' or User_department like '%${check}%' limit ${start},${limit}
select count(user_id) from crm_user where user_id like '%${check}%' or user_loginname like '%${check}%' or User_realname like '%${check}%' or user_department like '%${check}%'
mapper.insert: insert into crm_user(user_id, user_loginname, user_loginpass, user_realname, user_addr, user_tel, user_sex,user_department) values (#{uuid}, #{user_loginname},#{user_loginpass}, #{user_realname},#{user_addr},#{user_tel},#{user_sex},#{user_department})
mapper.update: update crm_user set User_realname=#{user_realname}, User_sex=#{user_sex}, User_tel=#{user_tel}, User_addr=#{user_addr}, User_loginpass=#{user_loginpass}, User_department=#{user_department} where User_id=#{user_id}
mapper.delete: delete from crm_user where User_id in (${userids})
